channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: China is using silver as an economic weapon. What that means for investors and prices.
item.description: China controls around 70% of the silver that Big Tech, AI and solar power desperately need. Beijing is locking the gates.

item.title: Tax-related selling could set up these 11 stocks for big gains early in 2026
item.description: Insider share ownership and corporate profitability are key to finding stocks that have been temporarily sold off.

item.title: Tesla EV sales fall short of Wall Street’s low expectations
item.description: Tesla’s rough year took it to its second straight annual sales decline, and saw it lose its global EV sales leadership to China’s BYD.

item.title: Could retail actually rebound in 2026? These are the chains — and trends — to watch.
item.description: Beyond the biggest chains, the past few years have largely been ones to forget for retailers, as shoppers have remained wary about spending amid a bat...

item.title: These undervalued stocks blew away the S&P 500 in 2025 — a 2026 repeat is likely
item.description: Valuation indicators now are extremely bearish for U.S. stocks. Non-U.S. stocks are a much better bet.

item.title: SpaceX stock debut is the big market event of 2026. Why Musk's venture could be biggest IPO ever
item.description: Investors have already thrown their weight behind the company ahead of its planned IPO.

item.title: These two semi stocks lagged in 2025. Why Loop Capital sees them doing well in 2026
item.description: The firm expects semiconductor sales growth in 2026 to broaden out and include acceleration in automotive and industrial chips.

item.title: Berkshire Hathaway shares dip as Warren Buffett exits and Greg Abel era begins
item.description: Investors digested the formal end of Warren Buffett's six-decade tenure as chief executive and the start of a new era under successor Greg Abel.

item.title: Want a way to trade this snowy, harsh winter? There are stocks for that
item.description: A colder-than-normal winter could spell opportunities for machinery manufacturers such as Douglas Dynamics.

item.title: Ken Griffin’s flagship hedge fund at Citadel rises 10.2% in volatile 2025
item.description: Citadel's flagship multistrategy Wellington fund, its largest, gained 10.2% in 2025, according to a person familiar with the firm's returns.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
